def calc(self, sentence, DAG, route):
        N = len(sentence)
        route[N] = (0, 0)
        logtotal = log(self.total)
        for idx in xrange(N - 1, -1, -1):
            route[idx] = max((log(self.FREQ.get(sentence[idx:x + 1]) or 1) -
                              logtotal + route[x + 1][0], x) for x in DAG[idx])
